auth_Bearer.label: Authorization (Bearer)
auth_Bearer.note: The API key can be obtained from [here](https://web.placetel.de/settings/api#api_token)

getNumbersNumberIdProfiles.title: List profiles for a number
getNumbersNumberIdProfiles.description: Lists all available profiles for a number

getNumbers.title: Get all numbers
getNumbers.description: Provides a list of all numbers

getContacts.title: Get all contacts
getContacts.description: Provides a list of all contacts

getFaxes.title: Fetch in- and outbound faxes
getFaxes.description: Provides a list of all faxes

getPrompts.title: Fetch all prompts
getPrompts.description: Provides a list of all prompts

getSipUsers.title: Fetch all sip users
getSipUsers.description: Fetch a list of all sip users

getSubscriptions.title: List subscriptions
getSubscriptions.description: Fetch a list of all registered subscriptions

getUsers.title: Fetch all users
getUsers.description: Fetch a list of all users of the account

getGroups.title: Fetch all groups
getGroups.description: Fetch a list of all groups

getRoutingPlansIdSimulate.title: Simulate the usage of a routing plan
getRoutingPlansIdSimulate.description: Simulate the usage of a routing plan

getRoutingPlans.title: Get all routing plans
getRoutingPlans.description: Provides a list of routing plans

getCalls.title: Fetch all incoming calls
getCalls.description: Provides a list of all calls

getCallDetailRecords.title: Get call detail records
getCallDetailRecords.description: Provides a list of call detail records

getCallCenterCalls.title: Fetch all call center calls
getCallCenterCalls.description: Provides a list of all call center calls

getCallCenterAgents.title: Fetch all call center agents
getCallCenterAgents.description: Provides a list of all call center agents

getCallCenterQueues.title: Fetch all call center queues
getCallCenterQueues.description: Provides a list of all call center queues

getDevices.title: Fetch all devices
getDevices.description: Fetch a list of all provisionable devices

getProvisionings.title: Get all phone provisionings
getProvisionings.description: Provides a full list of all registered provisioned phones

getRecordings.title: Fetch call recordings
getRecordings.description: Provides a list of all call recordings

getMe.title: Me
getMe.description: Information about the current API user

deleteNumbersNumberIdProfilesId.title: Delete a profile for a number
deleteNumbersNumberIdProfilesId.description: Removes the profile for a number

putNumbersNumberIdProfiles.title: Activates a profile for a number
putNumbersNumberIdProfiles.description: Change the active profile for a number

postNumbersNumberIdProfiles.title: Creates a new profile for a number
postNumbersNumberIdProfiles.description: Shows the active profile for a number

getNumbersId.title: Retrieve a number
getNumbersId.description: Fetches a number by its ID

deleteContactsId.title: Deletes a contact
deleteContactsId.description: Deletes a contact by its ID

putContactsId.title: Update a contact
putContactsId.description: Updates a contact for a given ID

getContactsId.title: Retrieve a contact
getContactsId.description: Fetches a contact by its ID

postCtiMacSendDtmfDigits.title: Send DTMF Digits
postCtiMacSendDtmfDigits.description: This method allows to sendDTMFDigits on a current active call.

postCtiMacStartTransfer.title: Start transfer
postCtiMacStartTransfer.description: This method allows to initiate the tranfser on the call specified by the call_id.

postCtiMacStartConference.title: Start conference
postCtiMacStartConference.description: This method allows to initiate conference on the call specified by the call_id.

postCtiMacResume.title: Resume
postCtiMacResume.description: This method allows device to resume the call specified by the call_id.

postCtiMacHold.title: Hold
postCtiMacHold.description: This method allows device to hold the call specified by the call_id.

postCtiMacHangup.title: Hangup
postCtiMacHangup.description: This method allows device to end the call specified by the call_id.

postCtiMacDialDigit.title: Dial digit
postCtiMacDialDigit.description: This method initiates a new call.

postCtiMacDial.title: Dial
postCtiMacDial.description: This method initiates a new call.

postCtiMacDecline.title: Decline
postCtiMacDecline.description: This method allows device to Decline the call specified by the call_id.

postCtiMacCompleteTransfer.title: Complete transfer
postCtiMacCompleteTransfer.description: This method allows to initiate the tranfser on the call specified by the call_id.

postCtiMacCompleteConference.title: Complete conference
postCtiMacCompleteConference.description: This method allows to complete conference on the call specified by the call_id.

postCtiMacBlindTransfer.title: Blind transfer
postCtiMacBlindTransfer.description: This method allows to do a blind tranfser on the call specified by the call_id.

postCtiMacAnswer.title: Answer
postCtiMacAnswer.description: This method allows device to answer a ringing call with given call_id.

deleteFaxesId.title: Delete a fax
deleteFaxesId.description: Delete a fax by its ID

putRoutingsNumberOrId.title: Update routing
putRoutingsNumberOrId.description: Updates the routing object. Routing can be set to: `forward`, `group`, `plan`, `ivr`, `queue` or `api`

postRoutings.title: Create a routing object
postRoutings.description: Create a routing object. Routing can be created as: `forward`, `group`, `ivr`, `queue` or `api`

deleteCallsId.description: Delete a call by its ID

getCallsId.description: Fetches a call by its ID

putCallCenterAgentsId.title: Update an agent
putCallCenterAgentsId.description: Update an agent by its ID

getProvisioningsId.description: Fetches a phone provisioning by its ID

postProvisioningsIdReconfigure.title: Trigger reconfiguration of a phone
postProvisioningsIdReconfigure.description: This sends a SIP command to the user on line 1 to fetch configuration changes.

deleteRecordingsId.title: Delete a recording
